attributes.action: Give captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: He has raised more than £12,000,000 for the NHS and he is also a WW2 veteran he has given so much to us as a country his efforts deserve acknowledgement.
attributes.background: To put forward captain Tom Moore to receive a knighthood. He has raised more than £12,000,000 for the NHS.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
